summary: This is an email chain from December 2020, forwarded to a VictimServices mailbox. It contains an inquiry from an individual who identifies as a victim of Jeffrey Epstein, alleging rape in 1991 and making serious accusations of corruption and fraud against the administrator of the Epstein victims fund.

persons.name: Jeff Epstein
persons.context: Named as the perpetrator who raped the email sender in 1991.

persons.name: Peter Joy
persons.context: Mentioned as the person whose apartment was the location of the alleged rape in 1991.

connections.description: Epstein allegedly raped the victim at Peter Joy's apartment, indicating a connection to that location.

events.title: Alleged Rape by Epstein
events.description: The email sender states she was raped by Jeffrey Epstein at Peter Joy's apartment.

events.title: Victim's Email Inquiry
events.description: An individual identifying as an Epstein victim sends an email alleging corruption in the victims fund and requesting services.

keyFacts: An individual identifies as a victim of Jeffrey Epstein, alleging he raped her in 1991 at Peter Joy's apartment.
The email makes serious allegations that the administrator of the Epstein victims fund is corrupt, excluding real victims, filing claims under false identities, and laundering money.
The victim states the fund administrator's actions are causing additional harm, requiring more victim services.
The correspondence shows ongoing victim outreach and allegations regarding the management of victim compensation years after Epstein's death.
